query:
UPDATE lessons
         SET
            title = COALESCE($1, title),
            topic = COALESCE($2, topic),
            markdown = COALESCE($3, markdown),
            assignee = CASE
            WHEN $7 = true THEN NULL
            ELSE 
            COALESCE($4, assignee)
            END
         WHERE id = $5 AND created_by = $6
